content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help. I'm thrilled to hear that you feel more confident in choosing the right recessed lighting system for your kitchen.

Remember to take your time, do your research, and consider your specific needs and preferences when making your final decision. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, don't hesitate to reach out.

Good luck with your kitchen renovation, and I hope you'll enjoy your new recessed lighting system!

Happy renovating!
